data.name: The Last Friend Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Enjoy the riveting and heart-pumping music of The Last Friend wherever you go with this amazing soundtrack that'll shake your subWOOFers!
data.about_the_game: Enjoy the riveting and heart-pumping music of The Last Friend wherever you go with this amazing soundtrack that'll shake your subWOOFers!
data.short_description: Doggone tired of the typical brawler or tower defense that is all bark and no bite? Then join Alpha and T. Juan on a dynamic adventure that has you battling hordes of baddies and bosses on their mission to save all the Doggos!
